synopsis.text: Located in western Tokyo is the enormous Academy City, home to over 2 million students developing supernatural abilities. Touma Kamijou is one such student, possessing the unique "Imagine Breaker" power in his right hand. After meeting Index, a girl fleeing the world of magic, Touma's life takes an extraordinary turn. He becomes embroiled in adventures on both the science and magic sides, expanding his circle of allies. Tensions escalate between Academy City and the Roman Orthodox Church's magic side. Both prepare for conflict as Touma and his friends take a stand, striving to protect each other against the hostile factions. When science and magic collide again, the story takes off with high stakes action.
